alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Bradford and Alachua Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms centered near Gainesville Airport, or 7 miles northeast of Gainesville, moving southwest at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. Rainfall rates of 2 to 3 inches per hour are anticipated. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, High Springs, Archer, University Of Florida, Rochelle, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Newberry and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
